sentences.en: Back slant: Backward sloping typeface, i . e . opposite to italic.
sentences.cn: 左斜字体: 向左倾斜的字体. 即是一般斜体字的反向.

sentences.en: Defines a programming variable. Typically renders in an italic font style.
sentences.cn: 定义程序变量, 通常以斜体显示.

sentences.en: Have you read the article with a title in italic type?
sentences.cn: 你读了那篇斜体字标题的文章了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Italic Button 015015 Applies italic formatting to the selected cells or objects.
sentences.cn: 对选定的单元格或对象使用或取消倾斜设置.

sentences.en: Makes the current run in the selection italic ( toggle )
sentences.cn: 将所选内容中的当前局部设为倾斜 ( 切换方式 )

sentences.en: Returns or sets the italic style for the current cell text.
sentences.cn: 返回或设置当前单元格文本的斜体样式.

sentences.en: She addressed them by hand in her beautiful italic script.
sentences.cn: 她用漂亮的斜体字写明了收信人姓名和地址。

sentences.en: The example sentences in this dictionary are printed in italic type.
sentences.cn: 本词典中的例句都是用斜体排印的。

sentences.en: The examples in that dictionary are in italic type.
sentences.cn: 那本字典的例句是用斜体字印刷的.

sentences.en: The title is printed in italics.
This close italic print is very hard on the eyes.
sentences.cn: 看这种排得很紧的斜体字,很伤人的眼睛.

sentences.en: This examples uses the CITE element to render a citation in italic.
sentences.cn: 下面的例子使用了CITE元素将引文以斜体显示.

sentences.en: Use markers ITALIC and ENDITALIC to identify segments for italic font, as this segment.
sentences.cn: 把需要显示成斜体字的片段用标记ITALIC与ENDITALIC夹起来, 如本片段.

sentences.en: You can specify whether the font should be underlined, italic, or boldface.
sentences.cn: 您可以指定的字体是否应当强调, 斜体或粗体.

words.tran_cn: 在字下划横线；用斜体字排字；强调

trans.tran_cn: （印刷字体）斜体的，（书写）整齐尖细的，(I-)古意大利的
trans.tran_en: Italic letters slope to the right
Italics are letters that slope to the right. Italics are often used to emphasize a particular word or sentence. The examples in this dictionary are printed in italics.
